title-part.text: EQUIPMENT FOR FITTING IN OR TO AIRCRAFT
ARRANGEMENTS OR MOUNTING OF POWERPLANTS OR PROPULSION TRANSMISSIONS

note.note-paragraph: The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups: B64D15/18 covered by B64D15/16 B64D25/102 covered by B64D25/10 B64D25/105 covered by B64D25/10 B64D25/108 covered by B64D25/10 B64D25/11 covered by B64D25/10 B64D25/112 covered by B64D25/10 B64D25/115 covered by B64D25/10 B64D25/118 covered by B64D25/10

title-part.text: Dropping, ejecting, releasing, or receiving articles, liquids, or the like, in flight

reference.text: with respect to weapon sights devices F41G takes precedence, parachutes per se B64D17/00 ; ejectable seats B64D25/10 ; ejectable capsules B64D25/12 ; refuelling during flight B64D39/00 ; launching apparatus for projecting projectiles or missiles F41F1/00 , F41F7/00 ; rocket or torpedo launchers F41F3/00

title-part.text: by spraying gases in cabins ,or by shooting darts with anesthetic effects
detecting passenger or pilot behaviors by sensors, e.g. biometrics
by communicating emergency situations to ground control, or between crew members
by protecting cabin or luggage from bombs
by overriding pilot's controls, or by directing aircraft from ground control to avoid certain paths or zones
by avoiding the use of electronic equipment during flight, e.g. of mobile phones or laptops

Indicators or signs in the cabin, e.g. exit signs or seat numbering
Flight bags, including electronic type flight bags
Devices for detecting or indicating hard landing
Devices for aircraft health monitoring, e.g. monitoring flutter or vibration
Erosion protection, e.g. from airborne particles
Devices specially adapted to avoid bird strike
Airbags mounted in aircraft for any use
Aircraft or airfield lights using LEDs
Aircraft with means for ground manoeuvring, such as taxiing, using an auxiliary thrust system, e.g. jet-engines, propellers or compressed air
Arrangements of solar panels on aircraft
Electric power distribution systems onboard aircraft
